event.title: South West Ruby #20
event.description:
Join us at Cookpad HQ in Bristol this month for a great talk and **an exciting Ruby Quiz**. Expect another Ruby packed evening with plenty of conversation, beers and bites to eat.

Schedule

18:30 - 19:00 - Arrive, grab a drink, some delicious locally supplied food and have a chat with fellow attendees

19:00 - "Rewriting your code at scale with synvert‚Äù by @NoNeeeed

19:45 - Ruby Quiz with mystery prizes

Slack

If you like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel

Notices

Please let us know in the comments of the event if you have any specific food allergies, dietary or access requirements so we can be sure to best accommodate everyone!
